city.cs.engine

Class BodyImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.BodyImage

  • public class BodyImage
extends Object
    Images to use for rendering a Body. The same image can be shared by multiple bodies. By default the image is displayed in full, which usually requires an image having a transparent background, with the visible part approximating the shape of the simulated body. Alternatively the image may be specified as clipped to the shape of the body.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BodyImage(String fileName)
      Create a new image with the default height (1 metre), centred on the body's origin.
      BodyImage(String fileName, float height)
      Create a new image with the specified height, centred on the body's origin.
      BodyImage(String fileName, float height, Vec2 offset)
      Create a new image with the specified height and offset by a specified amount from the body's origin.
      BodyImage(URL url)
      Create a new image with the default height (1 metre), centred on the body's origin.
      BodyImage(URL url, float height)
      Create a new image with the specified height, centred on the body's origin.
      BodyImage(URL url, float height, Vec2 offset)
      Create a new image with the specified height and offset by a specified amount from the body's origin.
